channel.title: Editing Minimap/terrain Texture?
channel.description:
Hey guys. I've searched around a lot, looked into a renamed client, and asked my friends, but none helped help me solve my question. I heard Kevin (From R-S) had released a floor editor (Which is what I want) but as you know, R-S's domain expired. So, no luck from that.
Instead of being spoon-fed and asking for the tool, I'm asking if anyone knows how to edit the floor textures and/[b]or[/b] the minimap, and if they'd be kind enough to tell me how do to it, so I can make a tool to that does it.
Pretty much what I want is to be able to change the green grass into a gray path, and create a town... But, if no one can help me with changing it, that's fine...
Thanks for helping. But I doubt that anyone here who knows where & how to edit the floor textures will share it anyways... Worth a shot though ;)
~Lin
[b]EDIT: Sorry, I don't mean overall textures. Here's an example of what I mean...[/b] [img]http://img372.imageshack.us/img372/8036/56581521yo5.png[/img] Making a gray path in a patch of grass.

item.title: Editing Minimap/terrain Texture?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:6, topic:251101”]You are able to edit them, But it would be rare that anybody would release it,
Unless of course it would be put to some use,

The RSC side of this community have created one of these, Or a few of these actually,
It would be the same principle along the lines of making it, It’d be Simular, But completely different in a way.[/quote]Actually, I have a program that does it, and Cocoa gave it to me… But, he forgot to give me a file so no luck there… And Kevin’s floor editor was released on R-S, but the link to download on it is dead (FUCKING UPPIT). Plus PIMP3D was going to give it to me (I don’t know what happened there…).

So 3 failed possibilities… Hopefully there’s still a chance I can get it…

Read full topic

item.title: Editing Minimap/terrain Texture?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You are able to edit them, But it would be rare that anybody would release it,
Unless of course it would be put to some use,

The RSC side of this community have created one of these, Or a few of these actually,
It would be the same principle along the lines of making it, It’d be Simular, But completely different in a way.

Read full topic

But I doubt that anyone here who knows where & how to edit the floor textures will share it anyways…
[/quote]
Your right.
Everyone here is dead beat.
anyway, i have the program. Ill Upload in a second.[/quote]

your abel to make your own floor textures?? dang dident know we were this far

Read full topic
